title: Maximum in Array
code:
§begin find_maximum
  values ← [3, 9, 2, 15, 7]
  max_val ← 0
  §iterate val §in values
    §if val ⊗ max_val
      max_val ← val
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit max_val
§end
solution_description: finds the largest value in an array
hints: max_val is updated when a larger value is found
The loop checks each value against the current maximum
This finds the largest number in the array
